nodes.text: Amgis were a pair Heavy Lifters used by the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War.

Amgis were dispatched to pick up two Cargo containers that contained munitions stolen from an Imperial armory. Despite enemy fire they were protected by Assault Gunboats and managed to recover the containers and bring them back to the Empire. The events regarding this were recorded in the Combat chamber to train future pilots such as Maarek Stele.
